answers.answer: ohhhhh boy I really think that is a question U have to take up with your doctor .Look at the info about sub see if there any other reactions like that with sub .
I Agree - I took sub for years and have never heard of this as a side effect.  Being tired and maybe some headache is the most common for sub.  Definitely speak with your doctor about this.

My son is 40 days of Suboxone and was just hospitalized tonight with a blood sugar 475. No prior diabetes history!?! Plan to ask MD about possible connection. Prob knows less than I. Do about Suboxone. I have a family member MD who works with Sub. Will be asking him tomorrow

question: Can the process of detoxification with suboxone cause diabetic problems?
title: diabetes related to suboxone detoxification
